description.en:
1-4: Kimi Note  
For some reason, Miyasaka finds himself absolutely enamored by the scent of his attractive male classmate Sawatari. But when he tries the cologne Sawatari recommends, the effect just isn't the same – it has to be on Sawatari, or the cologne won't have the same effect.  
A sweet story about the high school love between two boys.  
  
5: Replay  
Nishigaki was in a relationship with his junior Yaguchi during high-school. While attending his sister's wedding, Nishigaki remembers the day they broke up – when he took a gamble and told Yaguchi he would be attending a far away college… to see if Yaguchi would ask him to stay.   
What will happen now, years later, when Nishigaki sees Yaguchi at the wedding?  
  
6: Whisper Of King  
Kugayama has been sleeping with his club senpai since Ashiya made a move on him at a party. They're not lovers, and Kugayama never even knows if there will be a "next time", and so his insecurity continues following their ambiguous relationship. Until one day, a senpai who graduated comes back for a reunion party… and Ashiya starts acting all weird. What will happen to Kugayama?  
  
7: Go Home  
Nakano had his senpai suddenly crash at his place after getting kicked out of his apartment for various offensive actions – like a threesome in his room. The problem is, Nakano is in love with his senpai, and he knows it's only a matter of time before he can't help himself. One night, Nakano comes home to his senpai on his bed…. with a girl?!
description.pl: W ławce przed nim siedzi zwyczajny chłopak… Ale czy zwyczajny chłopak powinien pachnieć aż tak dobrze?! Zapach, który wdzierał się do jego nozdrzy był upajający, ale uczucie, które zaczęło wdzierać się do jego serca było… czym właściwie było?
